name: Unit (Room) Hydraulic Services ITP V.050221
Room Aerial Drainage Installation
Workshop Drawings for construction & approved
Hydraulic Drawing & revision number(s)
Check scope of works/specification & ensure all documents are current
Check for any purchaser upgrades & ensure required changes are installed if approved
Fire collars cleared of concrete slurry & logged to Firedoc
Approved Material delivered to site and stored/ secured safely
Sewer services installed correctly as per workshop drawings
Stormwater services installed correctly as per workshop drawings
Drainage risers and vent riser services installed correctly as per workshop drawings and schematics
Minimum Grades installed as per AS3500
Bracketing installed as per AS3500 and manufacturers specifications
Sufficient IO's installed for compliance and maintenance requirements
Pink primer and Blue glue used only on UPVC
Hydrostatic test filled with water to a height not less than 1m above soffit level of highest pipe for a minimum of 15min
Correct fire collars installed with test reports on file. Retro fit floor waste collars installed
Fire penetration stickers installed and photographed
Smoke seal all penetrations
Pipes labelled as per AS3500
Co-ordination with walls and other services overviewed and co-ordinated onsite
Acoustic lagging as per project requirements
Sponges installed in Floor wastes
All points capped off to ensure no builders debri enters system
Update Asbuilt drawing immediately
Confirm IL of pipework
Clean up & excess material stored away
All Drainage works completed to specification/drawings & Area left clean/tidy
